ComicInfo.Summary:
One of the most highly anticipated new video games of 2000 is now its own special one- shot comic book! Top Cow Productions and Eidos interactive join forces to unleash Fear Effect, a stylistic tale of intrigue and suspense with lives on the line and the forces of Hell ready to take over the world. Featuring Hana Tsu-Vachal, the heroine of the new millennium, Royce Glas, the classic protagonist and Jakob "Deke" Decourt, resident demolitions expert, expect to be taken on a ride like none other as our three mercenaries attempt to survive long enough to complete their latest job and collect their payday! With its futuristic setting and Anime influence, prepare to experience the adrenaline rush of your life!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-27 23:25:59. [CVDB200427]
